modName: Hide armor and Better power attack
summary: This mod adds a unique hide armor to Dragonsreach also adds a 2 perks one to the Champions stance and the other Fighting Stance allowing 50% less stamina use on power attacks
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a unique hide armor to Dragonsreach adds a 2 perks one to the Champions stance and the other Fighting Stance allowing 50% less stamina use on power attacks
